scripts.say: The SG radar has spotted numerous incoming signals. Enemy units increasing!
Didn't expect there to be so many Sirens...
It seems they are trying to overwhelm us with sheer numbers.
Hmm, it seems we'll have a tough fight ahead of us in order to breakthrough these Sirens.
The hell with it, let's sink these Sirens before we run out of ammo. Ready your guns and maintain formation!
Wait, the number of enemies is... suddenly dropping!
A large number of air units were spotted on our airborne radar... but I canâ€™t identify the model type!
